title: thillai naTarajanE
sahitya:
tillai naTarAjanE shivakAmi nEshanE un -nanbAl illai enakkOr yOcanai



anupallavi



allum paghalum un Ananda naTanattai akhilamellAm kAnum

arivenak-karuLvAi



caraNam



kuncitapada nizhal iruppEnE adaik-konjik-konjit-tamizh surappEnE

anjalikkarattinAl Ashi peTrun shakti Adalil anudinam kUDi magizhvEnE
